title: cmd/gc: the if's initial statement rejects struct literal assignment
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/zRkdysHLE- is rejected at parse time.

http://play.golang.org/p/krYdBVCmdg is accepted, but it differs only in using a slice
literal rather than a struct.

I couldn't find the text (grammar rule, restriction, etc.) in the spec responsible for
rejecting this case.
